thread.title: Only 10 out of 19 PAGASA weather radars are operational: lawmaker | ABS-CBN News
thread.title_full: Only 10 out of 19 PAGASA weather radars are operational: lawmaker | ABS-CBN News

author: Christopher Sitson
title: Only 10 out of 19 PAGASA weather radars are operational: lawmaker | ABS-CBN News
text: \u003ePedestrians brave the floodwaters brought by a strong downpour due to a low-pressure area and the southwest monsoon along United Nations Avenue in Manila on July 13, 2023. \u003cem\u003eJonathan Cellona, ABS-CBN News/File\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/div\u003e\u003cp\u003eMANILA — Only 10 of 19 radars of the state weather bureau PAGASA are currently operational, a lawmaker said Thursday.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eThe Philippines is directly hit or affected by an average of 20 storms each year, making weather technology a crucial tool for the disaster-prone country.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cdiv\u003e\u003ca href=\\ \u003ePedestrians brave the floodwaters brought by a strong downpour due to a low-pressure area and the southwest monsoon along United Nations Avenue in Manila on July 13, 2023. \u003cem\u003eJonathan Cellona, ABS-CBN
